item.title: Lines for Winter
item.description: Lines for Winter Is that shadows of mountains or cloud? Grains of headlights Flashing before my eyes The long line of snakes Branches take off their disguise â€”Another layer beyond the reality Don’t tell me Snow in everywhere Two hundred kilometers away Or a hundred and twenty miles In American way Still not charged In the time of several chars Someone standing at the beach head Or what? The wind blew up the coat
